title: Manohari Ruby Diamond Haaram Set - A Timeless Elegance
features: This exquisitely crafted Haaram features a contemporary floral design, delicately accented with heart-shaped rubies and sparkling diamonds. The necklace boasts a flexible mesh chain, ensuring a comfortable and elegant drape. The matching earrings echo the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and stunning set. The delicate diamond setting enhances the brilliance of the gemstones, adding a touch of modern sophistication to the traditional Haaram style.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. This set is also ideal for festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti.
description: A stunning blend of traditional and modern design, this Haaram set is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship. The use of high-quality rubies and diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of local heritage, making it a truly unique and special piece. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
